name: UnofficialStarWarsMoviePicker
0:
”Alexa, ask Movie Picker to select a Star Wars movie to watch”
”Alexa, ask Movie Picker to recommend a Star Wars movie to watch”
”Alexa, ask Movie Picker which one to watch”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie picker
des:
Are you having a trouble to figure out which Star Wars movie to watch today? Just ask Alexa to have Unofficial Star Wars Movie Picker give you a suggestion for one and it should be fun. I created this Alexa Skill as a Star Wars fan, and I am not associated with Star Wars, Lucasfilm, or Disney in any way. This Skill was not created or endorsed by Amazon. 

Example interactions:
"Alexa, ask Movie Picker..."

...any suggestion for a Star Wars movie?
...choose a Star Wars movie for me to watch?
...select a Star Wars movie to watch?
...recommend a Star Wars movie to watch?
...which Star Wars movie I should watch?
...which one to watch?
...select one to watch?
...recommend one to watch?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
